validParams.name: list
validParams.description: An input file containing a node per line

validParams.name: seedlist
validParams.description: If we want the number of components we put 1, otherwise we put 0

validParams.name: group
validParams.description: Values all(by default) or curated. It is An argument saying whether you want a curated interactome or the whole interactome

validParams.name: intermediate
validParams.description: If we want the intermediate we put 1, otherwise we put 0

validParams.name: o-name
validParams.description: If there is this argument, it will create an output .cmp file for the information of each component

validParams.name: components
validParams.description: If we want the number of components we put 1, otherwise we put 0

validParams.name: order
validParams.description: Here we indicate wether we want to order the list ascending(default) or descending

validParams.name: significant-value
validParams.description: Here we indicate the significant value

validParams.name: list-tags
validParams.description: An argument saying if you want genes, proteins(default) or transcripts
